replies.body: I do see that you got a day one chest, but it may take a bit to receive your premium chest after reaching level 5.  It's going to take about a day to appear on your account, so hang tight.  Let me know if it doesn't show up thenm

> I do see that you got a day one chest, but it may take a bit to receive your premium chest after reaching level 5.

Premium chest? What you talking about Rito Games?

New players should see 2 new chests.  The first is a Day One chest which is a normal hextech chest, and the other is the [Introductory ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)chest.  Same thing, I'll stick to introductory for now on.  Sorry for the confusion!
I still haven't gotten them ;-;
That's really strange, but not to worry.  The chest has now been added to your account!
thank you so much,! but i don't have a key .-.

omg.  x_x  You should find one now!

https://i.makeagif.com/media/2-27-2015/UFXpKU.gif
Hello, I am lvl 11 now still no chest
thank u, fucking love riot.
You will soon think the opposite,after you find out that this is a greedy company,and balance is not good at all
yeah thats why they banned me for 1 fucking game
Hello, mister Porocles. I created an account around 2-3 days ago but still havent received the chest containing Garen and Ashe champion shards. could you please help? thank you very much
I didn't recieve the chest yet, its been 24 hours  i think
Is there a reason Riot decided to discontinue the 400 RP per new account and just go with chests instead? Was it smurfing or new bot accounts that did it?
Hi. I also didn't recieve a garen and ashe chest? I got one where I recieved the lollipoppy skin and a Blood Moon ward skin, but I didnt get the garen and ashe one.
Need help pls I only got orange essence and a ward skin and a Warwick skin im level 8 and I haven't received the chest with the Garen and Ashe Shard
I still have not gotten these chests after hitting level 5 24 hours ago
pls help i didn't receive garen and ashe. i'm lvl 6 and i really need them for the rerol{{champion:22}} {{champion:86}} l . please help me.
you know i still didnt get the chest also? i just checked again and it was dunkmaster darius *the premium skin shard chest* i feel you :(
I STILL HAVEN'T RECIEVED IT ITS BEEN 2 DAYS!! AGH!!{{champion:32}}
You're going to need to give more context if you want someone to assist you.
how so? i just didn't get the chests and im like level 6 right now

> how so? i just didn't get the chests and im like level 6 right now

Is this for a new account?
yes sir

> yes sir

You should have gotten your 1-time free Hextech chest as soon as you made the account (I believe). You only get 1 key/chest combo though. The skin inside the chest should also be for a skin that is worth 975  RP or less for a champion that you own.
